caption.title: Waterbirdsâ€™ associations with environmental features.
caption.p: Waterbird species (n = 69) are grouped into 7 different guilds. Lines connect waterbird guilds with those habitat variables driving their distribution. Those environmental features making up > 15% relative importance for BRT and included in the final GAMs for >80% of species within guilds are highlighted with bold lines. In the case of GAMs, red lines indicate negative effects on respective guilds, whereas blue lines indicate positive effects.
